Sample function to send SMS on appointment booked:

```js
const functions = require("firebase-functions");
const twilio = require("twilio");

const accountSid = functions.config().twilio.sid;
const authToken = functions.config().twilio.token;
const messagingServiceSid = functions.config().twilio.service;

const client = twilio(accountSid, authToken);

exports.sendAppointmentReminder = functions.firestore
  .document("appointments/{appointmentId}")
  .onCreate(async (snap, context) => {
    const data = snap.data();
    await client.messages.create({
      body: `Hey ${data.clientName}, you have an appointment scheduled.`,
      from: "+1234567890",
      to: data.clientPhone,
      messagingServiceSid,
    });
  });
```

## ðŸ“± F. Real-Time Admin Dashboard (Mobile)

Already built in earlier steps â€” now connected to Firebase Firestore for real-time updates.

Example:

```jsx
import { useEffect, useState } from "react";
import { collection, query, where, onSnapshot } from "firebase/firestore";
import { db } from "../services/firebaseConfig";

export default function DashboardScreen() {
  const [clients, setClients] = useState([]);

  useEffect(() => {
    const q = query(collection(db, "clients"));
    const unsubscribe = onSnapshot(q, (snapshot) => {
      const list = [];
      snapshot.forEach((doc) => list.push(doc.data()));
      setClients(list);
    });

    return () => unsubscribe();
  }, []);

  return (
    <View>
      {clients.map(client => (
        <Text key={client.id}>{client.name}</Text>
      ))}
    </View>
  );
}
```

```jsx
import messaging from '@react-native-firebase/messaging';

async function requestUserPermission() {
  const authStatus = await messaging().requestPermission();
  if (authStatus === messaging.AuthorizationStatus.AUTHORIZED) {
    const fcmToken = await messaging().getToken();
    console.log("FCM Token:", fcmToken);
  }
}
```

Trigger notification via Firebase Function:

```js
messaging().onMessage(async remoteMessage => {
  Alert.alert("New Appointment", remoteMessage.notification.body);
});
```

## ðŸ§  Core Modules (`src/`)

### 1. `keyword_research.py`
```python
import requests
from dotenv import load_dotenv
import os

load_dotenv()

def fetch_keywords():
    headers = {"Authorization": f"Bearer {os.getenv('AHREFS_API_KEY')}"}
    response = requests.get("https://api.ahrefs.com/v3/kw-overview?target=law-of-attraction&mode=phrase")
    keywords = response.json()["referring_keywords"]
    return [kw["kw"] for kw in keywords[:20]]
```

### 2. `content_generation.py`
```python
import openai
from dotenv import load_dotenv
import os

load_dotenv()
openai.api_key = os.getenv("OPENAI_API_KEY")

def generate_youtube_script(keyword):
    prompt = open("prompts/youtube-script-prompt.txt").read().replace("{keyword}", keyword)
    response = openai.ChatCompletion.create(model="gpt-4", messages=[{"role": "user", "content": prompt}])
    return response.choices[0].message.content
```

### 3. `voiceover_generation.py`
```python
import requests
from dotenv import load_dotenv
import os

load_dotenv()

def generate_voiceover(text, voice_id="Rachel"):
    url = f"https://api.elevenlabs.io/v1/text-to-speech/{voice_id}"
    headers = {
        "xi-api-key": os.getenv("ELEVENLABS_API_KEY"),
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
    }
    payload = {"text": text, "model_id": "eleven_monolingual_v1"}
    response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, json=payload)
    with open("output/audio.mp3", "wb") as f:
        f.write(response.content)
    return "output/audio.mp3"
```

### 4. `video_production.py`
```python
import requests
from dotenv import load_dotenv
import os

load_dotenv()

def generate_video(script, voiceover_path):
    url = "https://api.pictory.ai/v1/create-video"
    headers = {
        "Authorization": f"Bearer {os.getenv('PICTORY_API_KEY')}",
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
    }
    payload = {
        "script": script,
        "voiceover": open(voiceover_path, "rb").read(),
        "style": "motivational",
        "background": "nature"
    }
    response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, data=payload)
    return response.json()["video_url"]
```

### 5. `publishing.py`
```python
from googleapiclient.discovery import build
from wordpress_xmlrpc import Client, WordPressPost
from wordpress_xmlrpc.methods.posts import NewPost

# YouTube upload
def upload_to_youtube(video_url):
    youtube = build("youtube", "v3", developerKey=os.getenv("YOUTUBE_API_KEY"))
    request = youtube.videos().insert(
        part="snippet,status",
        body={
            "snippet": {
                "title": "Daily Motivation - {keyword}",
                "description": "Motivational video powered by AI ðŸ’¡",
                "tags": ["motivation", "law of attraction"],
                "categoryId": "22"
            },
            "status": {"privacyStatus": "public"}
        },
        media_body=video_url
    )
    response = request.execute()
    return response["id"]

# WordPress blog post
def publish_blog_post(title, content):
    wp = Client(f"{os.getenv('WORDPRESS_SITE')}/xmlrpc.php", os.getenv("WORDPRESS_USER"), os.getenv("WORDPRESS_APP_PASSWORD"))
    post = WordPressPost()
    post.title = title
    post.content = content
    post.post_status = "publish"
    wp.call(NewPost(post))
```

```python
from googleapiclient.discovery import build
from datetime import datetime

def fetch_youtube_analytics():
    youtube = build("youtube", "v3", developerKey=os.getenv("YOUTUBE_API_KEY"))
    response = youtube.reports().query(
        ids="channel==MINE",
        startDate="2024-01-01",
        endDate=datetime.today().strftime("%Y-%m-%d"),
        metrics="views,likes,comments,estimatedRevenue",
        dimensions="day"
    ).execute()
    return response.get("rows", [])
```

```python
import requests
```

```python
import requests
from dotenv import load_dotenv
import os

load_dotenv()

def generate_voiceover(text, voice_id="Rachel"):
    url = f"https://api.elevenlabs.io/v1/text-to-speech/{voice_id}"
    headers = {"xi-api-key": os.getenv("ELEVENLABS_API_KEY"), "Content-Type": "application/json"}
    payload = {"text": text, "model_id": "eleven_monolingual_v1"}
    response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, json=payload)
    with open("output/audio.mp3", "wb") as f:
        f.write(response.content)
    return "output/audio.mp3"
```

```python
import requests
from dotenv import load_dotenv
import os

load_dotenv()

def generate_video(script, voiceover_path):
    url = "https://api.pictory.ai/v1/create-video"
    headers = {"Authorization": f"Bearer {os.getenv('PICTORY_API_KEY')}"}
    payload = {"script": script, "voiceover": open(voiceover_path, "rb").read(), "style": "motivational"}
    response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, data=payload)
    return response.json()["video_url"]
```

```python
from googleapiclient.discovery import build
from wordpress_xmlrpc import Client, WordPressPost
from wordpress_xmlrpc.methods.posts import NewPost

def upload_to_youtube(video_url):
    youtube = build("youtube", "v3", developerKey=os.getenv("YOUTUBE_API_KEY"))
    request = youtube.videos().insert(part="snippet,status", body={...}, media_body=video_url)
    return request.execute()["id"]

def publish_blog_post(title, content):
    wp = Client(f"{os.getenv('WORDPRESS_SITE')}/xmlrpc.php", os.getenv("WORDPRESS_USER"), os.getenv("WORDPRESS_APP_PASSWORD"))
    post = WordPressPost()
    post.title = title
    post.content = content
    wp.call(NewPost(post))
```

```js
const functions = require("firebase-functions");
const twilio = require("twilio");

const accountSid = functions.config().twilio.sid;
const authToken = functions.config().twilio.token;
const messagingServiceSid = functions.config().twilio.service;

const client = twilio(accountSid, authToken);

exports.sendAppointmentReminder = functions.firestore
  .document("appointments/{appointmentId}")
  .onCreate(async (snap, context) => {
    const data = snap.data();
    await client.messages.create({
      body: `Hey ${data.clientName}, you have an appointment scheduled.`,
      from: "+1234567890",
      to: data.clientPhone,
      messagingServiceSid,
    });
  });
```

## ðŸ“± F. Real-Time Admin Dashboard (Mobile)

Already built in earlier steps â€” now connected to Firebase Firestore for real-time updates.

Example:

```jsx
import { useEffect, useState } from "react";
import { collection, query, where, onSnapshot } from "firebase/firestore";
import { db } from "../services/firebaseConfig";

export default function DashboardScreen() {
  const [clients, setClients] = useState([]);

  useEffect(() => {
    const q = query(collection(db, "clients"));
    const unsubscribe = onSnapshot(q, (snapshot) => {
      const list = [];
      snapshot.forEach((doc) => list.push(doc.data()));
      setClients(list);
    });

    return () => unsubscribe();
  }, []);

  return (
    <View>
      {clients.map(client => (
        <Text key={client.id}>{client.name}</Text>
      ))}
    </View>
  );
}
```

```jsx
import messaging from '@react-native-firebase/messaging';

}
```

## ðŸ§  Core Modules (`src/`)

### 1. `keyword_research.py`
```python
import requests
from dotenv import load_dotenv
import os

load_dotenv()

def fetch_keywords():
    headers = {"Authorization": f"Bearer {os.getenv('AHREFS_API_KEY')}"}
    response = requests.get("https://api.ahrefs.com/v3/kw-overview?target=law-of-attraction&mode=phrase")
    keywords = response.json()["referring_keywords"]
    return [kw["kw"] for kw in keywords[:20]]
```

### 2. `content_generation.py`
```python
import openai
from dotenv import load_dotenv
import os

load_dotenv()
openai.api_key = os.getenv("OPENAI_API_KEY")

def generate_youtube_script(keyword):
    prompt = open("prompts/youtube-script-prompt.txt").read().replace("{keyword}", keyword)
    response = openai.ChatCompletion.create(model="gpt-4", messages=[{"role": "user", "content": prompt}])
    return response.choices[0].message.content
```

### 3. `voiceover_generation.py`
```python
import requests
from dotenv import load_dotenv
import os

load_dotenv()

def generate_voiceover(text, voice_id="Rachel"):
    url = f"https://api.elevenlabs.io/v1/text-to-speech/{voice_id}"
    headers = {
        "xi-api-key": os.getenv("ELEVENLABS_API_KEY"),
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
    }
    payload = {"text": text, "model_id": "eleven_monolingual_v1"}
    response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, json=payload)
    with open("output/audio.mp3", "wb") as f:
        f.write(response.content)
    return "output/audio.mp3"
```

### 4. `video_production.py`
```python
import requests
from dotenv import load_dotenv
import os

load_dotenv()

def generate_video(script, voiceover_path):
    url = "https://api.pictory.ai/v1/create-video"
    headers = {
        "Authorization": f"Bearer {os.getenv('PICTORY_API_KEY')}",
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
    }
    payload = {
        "script": script,
        "voiceover": open(voiceover_path, "rb").read(),
        "style": "motivational",
        "background": "nature"
    }
    response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, data=payload)
    return response.json()["video_url"]
```

### 5. `publishing.py`
```python
from googleapiclient.discovery import build
from wordpress_xmlrpc import Client, WordPressPost
from wordpress_xmlrpc.methods.posts import NewPost

# YouTube upload
def upload_to_youtube(video_url):
    youtube = build("youtube", "v3", developerKey=os.getenv("YOUTUBE_API_KEY"))
    request = youtube.videos().insert(
        part="snippet,status",
        body={
            "snippet": {
                "title": "Daily Motivation - {keyword}",
                "description": "Motivational video powered by AI ðŸ’¡",
                "tags": ["motivation", "law of attraction"],
                "categoryId": "22"
            },
            "status": {"privacyStatus": "public"}
        },
        media_body=video_url
    )
    response = request.execute()
    return response["id"]

# WordPress blog post
def publish_blog_post(title, content):
    wp = Client(f"{os.getenv('WORDPRESS_SITE')}/xmlrpc.php", os.getenv("WORDPRESS_USER"), os.getenv("WORDPRESS_APP_PASSWORD"))
    post = WordPressPost()
    post.title = title
    post.content = content
    post.post_status = "publish"
    wp.call(NewPost(post))
```

```python
from googleapiclient.discovery import build

def fetch_youtube_analytics():
    youtube = build("youtube", "v3", developerKey=os.getenv("YOUTUBE_API_KEY"))
    response = youtube.reports().query(
        ids="channel==MINE",
        startDate="2024-01-01",
        endDate=datetime.today().strftime("%Y-%m-%d"),
        metrics="views,likes,comments,estimatedRevenue",
        dimensions="day"
    ).execute()
    return response.get("rows", [])
```

### `src/keyword_research.py`

```python
import requests
from dotenv import load_dotenv
import os

load_dotenv()

def fetch_keywords():
    headers = {"Authorization": f"Bearer {os.getenv('AHREFS_API_KEY')}"}
    response = requests.get("https://api.ahrefs.com/v3/kw-overview?target=law-of-attraction&mode=phrase")
    keywords = response.json()["referring_keywords"]
    return [kw["kw"] for kw in keywords[:20]]
```

### `src/pipeline_controller.py`

```python
from keyword_research import fetch_keywords
from content_generation import generate_youtube_script
from voiceover_generation import generate_voiceover
from video_production import generate_video
from publishing import upload_to_youtube, publish_blog_post
from monetization import insert_affiliate_links
from analytics_reporting import fetch_youtube_analytics

def run_pipeline():
    print("ðŸš€ Starting AI Income Engine...")
    keywords = fetch_keywords()
    for keyword in keywords:
        print(f"ðŸ” Generating content for: {keyword}")
        script = generate_youtube_script(keyword)
        voiceover_path = generate_voiceover(script)
        video_url = generate_video(script, voiceover_path)
        video_id = upload_to_youtube(video_url)
        blog_content = insert_affiliate_links(script)
        publish_blog_post(f"Motivational Guide: {keyword}", blog_content)
    analytics = fetch_youtube_analytics()
    print("ðŸ“Š Daily Analytics:", analytics)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    run_pipeline()
```

### `workflows/run-pipeline.yml` (GitHub Actions)

```yaml
name: Run AI Income Engine
on:
  workflow_dispatch:
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 2 * * *'  # Run daily at 2 AM
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with:
          python-version: '3.10'
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          pip install -r requirements.txt
      - name: Run pipeline
        env:
          OPENAI_API_KEY: ${{ secrets.OPENAI_API_KEY }}
          ELEVENLABS_API_KEY: ${{ secrets.ELEVENLABS_API_KEY }}
        run: |
          python src/pipeline_controller.py
```
